Title: Get MSCRM Calendar in your custom application
Description: The MS CRM date control provides a rich user control, developers building MS CRM ISV solutions based on ASP .NET would love to use the same control as they already use the native CRM CSS and styles.

Project Description
The MS CRM date control provides a rich user control, developers building MS CRM ISV solutions based on ASP .NET would love to use the same control as they already use the native CRM CSS and styles.
